entry.title: Summer's Embrace
entry.summary:
Author: MrsRogersBarnes1008

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,452Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Every summer, the Kent and Wayne families gather for a tradition that’s equal parts chaos, comfort, and cosmic-level awkwardness. As the daughter of Superman, you’ve grown up juggling chores, school, and the occasional accidental super-strength mishap — but nothing prepares you for Damian Wayne: sharp-tongued, battle-trained, and determined to keep everyone at arm’s length. From childhood rivalries to late-night conversations in barns and on rooftops, your connection with him shifts in ways neither of you expect. Across years, cities, and clashing legacies — Kryptonian and human, assassin and hero — the two of you learn that growing up means confronting the shadows you inherit and the light you choose. A slow-burn story of summers, letters, family, and the long, messy path from antagonism to something much more. Expect: batbrother chaos, Smallville softness, Gotham sharp edges, lots of feelings, and two stubborn teens fighting the world — and their own hearts — every step of the way. P.S. This is my first story I am posting, so please be kind! Rude comments will not be tolerated.

entry.title: People Aren't Good
entry.summary:
Author: Miss_nightshade

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,141Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 20

Summary: Hecate has spent her life tucked into the bruised edges of Gotham’s Narrows, pretending to be a small, harmless girl with nothing worth noticing. It’s a fragile lie, but it holds. She goes to school. She walks home alone. She returns to a house that feels older than she is, a place that hums with magic she refuses to touch. She keeps her power buried. She ignores the ancient voices whispering inside her. She does everything she can to stay unseen. And for years, it works. Until the night it doesn’t.

entry.summary:
Author: strangenight (strangerlets)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,995Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 31

Summary: Strange cases begin to spread across Gotham, and not even Batman can explain what's happening. With John Constantine unable to help - and very reluctant - he ends up pointing to someone who should never have gotten involved. But as the city descends into chaos, Batman and his family learn that some monsters don't live in the shadows… they live within us.

entry.title: Reflections in the Glass
entry.summary:
Author: anastasia1513

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,320Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 38

Summary: You drop your hands, sighing. “One day you’re going to realize not everyone was raised in a league of assassins.” He hums, not looking up from his gauntlet as he scrolls through data. “If they were, my life would be considerably easier.” You step closer, bumping his shoulder lightly. “You love it.” “I love efficiency.” “You love me,” you correct softly. His head tilts toward you. His green eyes—sharp and calculating in battle—are different now, gentler. “That too.”

entry.title: Beware the Nightmares on the Land and Sea
entry.summary:
Author: HotaruKurosawa

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 68,241Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 32

Summary: One day, your life took a turn. For better or worse, you haven't decided yet. What you do know is that there are things on this planet that you never even knew existed. Things that your mind could never even imagine. Yet, here you are. Now, you must rebuild your life whilst trying to navigate this new one involving heroes and villains alike. Not to mention navigating the normal world and the magic one, as you possess a power that others could only dream of having. Whilst you are uncertain of how to navigate these changes in your life, these few things are certain. Don't go into the water past your knees.If you saw something that seemed abnormal, no you didn't.If you hear voices in your head, it will pass. Don't fully trust their advice.No matter what you do with your life, remember, it's not just yours that hangs in the balance.And lastly, whatever you do, don't have sex. These are the things you have to follow by to get through this life. If you don't, it won't be just you who deals with the consequences. Oh, and don't forget. The Eldritch Being inside of your chest is watching everything you do. Try not to disappoint her. Your Choices Matter.

entry.title: Under Protection
entry.summary:
Author: Nightly_Darkk

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,489Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 44

Summary: The mission sounded simple at first: protect Gotham's most infamous vigilantes in their civilian skins. The reality? Nothing is simple in Wayne Manor. The secrets there cling like shadows to the wall and for all of Batman's insistence of strategy, it's starting to feel a lot more like scheming. The BatBoys are restless, sharp, always watching. Constantly bristling at the idea of being protected.And in the middle of it all is her. A girl so unaware of the storm coming closer to her door each day. She isn't supposed to be there. She isn't even supposed to matter. But she does- and no one can say why. The was told to protect them. Nobody said what they'd have to protect themselves from.
